generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a clearly defined pedestrian path on the right side of the road, separated by a curb, which qualifies as a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures with windows and facades are visible in the background and to the right, which are buildings.
- wall: A large, solid, light-colored wall is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- fence: A metal fence is visible on the left side of the image, running along the edge of a property.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including one with traffic lights and others supporting overhead wires.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible mounted on a pole near the center-left of the image.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with a red border and a blue background is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the left side of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and blue.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible on the road in the distance on the left side of the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, being ridden by a person.
